name: Protect The Roots by Aum Sohoni
name_original: Protect The Roots by Aum Sohoni
description:
This is my Game for the Theme "Roots" in Global Game Jam 2023 ! ,  The story is about a Carrot who is protecting it's Roots ( ps :- it's family ) from the infection that is attacking ! , So just one Rule you gotta follow :- Kill and Survive Veggie soldier 

Controls:-

A , D :-  For movement 

Space :- Jump

Left Click :- Shoot
